title: [高分]服务器每隔三十分钟重启
author: you_ma
txt_content:
如题，最近玩家总说服务器卡还时不时重启，我就自己开了一下维护状态，自己在游戏里等，第一次开服重启17:27,第二次17:57。
服务器后台日志：




新建 文本文档 (2).txt
(173.54 KB, 下载次数: 18)



2017-1-14 18:07 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: Rhythm
replies.txt_content:
14.01 17:58:01 [面板] 服务器已停止
14.01 17:58:01 [面板] 好像崩溃了呢,检查下服务器控制台吧.返回值: 1
14.01 17:58:01 [面板] Restarting crashed server in 5 seconds
14.01 17:58:01 [面板] 服务器关闭(运行中)
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # /tmp/jvm-30074/hs_error.log
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # An error report file with more information is saved as:
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 1579679744 bytes for committing reserved memory.
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 #
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: 信息: os::commit_memory(0x000000070ec00000, 1579679744, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)
14.01 17:58:01 [Disconnect] User you_ma has disconnected, reason: Server shutting down
14.01 17:58:01 [Multicraft] Server stopped
14.01 17:58:01 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
14.01 17:58:01 [Multicraft] Restarting crashed server in 5 seconds
14.01 17:58:01 [Multicraft] Server shut down (running)
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # /tmp/jvm-30074/hs_error.log
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 1579679744 bytes for committing reserved memory.
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO #
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000070ec00000, 1579679744, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)
14.01 17:57:50 [服务器] 警告 Could not download GeoLiteAPI database [SocketTimeoutException]: connect timed out
14.01 17:57:50 [Server] WARN Could not download GeoLiteAPI database [SocketTimeoutException]: connect timed out
14.01 17:57:39 [服务器] 警告 Failed to delete GeoLiteAPI database
14.01 17:57:39 [Server] WARN Failed to delete GeoLiteAPI database


网页面板检测到服务器似乎崩溃了 就自动重启了服务器
疑似GeoLite API的问题

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 1579679744 bytes for committing reserved memory.
14.01 17:58:00 [服务器] 信息 # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.
内存不足导致崩溃

replies.author: Rhythm
replies.txt_content:
我估计是装的Mod多了 MaxPermSize不够 建议删除mod或者去更良心的面板服商家

14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # /tmp/jvm-30074/hs_error.log
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 1579679744 bytes for committing reserved memory.
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO #
14.01 17:58:00 [Server] INFO OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000070ec00000, 1579679744, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)

hs_error.log这个文件也找不到
好像是内存问题，这个可能是商家的问题，或者是你安装了太多MOD

replies.author: dddfly
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
